reuze.awt

Class ib_FilterGradient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ib_a_Ops
      • reuze.awt.ib_FilterGradient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    z_BufferedImageOp

    public class ib_FilterGradient
extends ib_a_Ops
    A filter which draws a coloured gradient. This is largely superseded by GradientPaint in Java1.2, but does provide a few more gradient options.
